title: FS: Sweet Caporal box front panel
author: GrayGhost

posts.post_title: FS: Sweet Caporal box front panel
posts.post_content:
This is the last one of these cool pieces I had. Its the front box panel from a T206 appropriate panel box. 

Great to go with your T206 cards. 

20 shipped. PM reserve. pp only. 

please see my other ads, incl some cool stuff for sale in the memorabilia BST and an auction for a 1954 Babe Ruth Topps scoops card.

thx all.

sold
